text:
The body of a 30-year-old man was found in a sewer canal here at Agaram in Karimangalam on Saturday. The victim, later identified as Ramamoorthy of Mahendramangalam, was found dead in the sewer canal adjacent to a private hall here.

Karimangalam police have registered a case. Police are yet to ascertain if the victim had accidentally fallen into the sewer in a drunk state, or if it was a case of murder.
title: Body found
